message.entry: Option must be specified before name-value pair.
Mixed inputs must be either single and double or integer and scalar double. All other combinations are not allowed.
{0} with two matrices to compare and two output arguments is not supported.
Dimension argument is not supported when two input arrays are provided.
Sparse integer and single operands are not supported for {0}.
Invalid second argument. When specifying an option, use {0}(X,[],option).
Invalid data type. First argument must be numeric or logical.
Invalid data type. Second argument must be numeric or logical.
Specify ''linear'' option when returning two outputs and the dimension is a vector.
Second output is not supported for matrices of this size.
''ComparisonMethod'' parameter only supported when input array is numeric or logical.
Invalid second argument. When specifying a name-value pair, use {0}(X,[],"ComparisonMethod",method).
